name: DIY Flower Tutorials-  Flower Patterns Bundle
description:
These full color tutorials will show you step by step how make my 3 BienAime Flower Patterns. With this package you get full color pdf directions for: 
The Trailing Bloom 
The Vintage Twisted Bloom 
The Bursting Bloom 
Make your own beautiful accessories at home and save a ton of money. All my tutorials are simple and easy to make. If you want to learn how to make all my blooms, check out my other Flower Tutorial Packages.

All tutorial PDFS are emailed to you within 24 hours to your paypal email account. If you have another email you would like them sent to , just contact me with the email address and I will send them your way!
